metaface.dsp
Class MetaFaceMbrola

java.lang.Object
  metaface.dsp.DigitalSignalProcessor
      metaface.dsp.MetaFaceMbrola
public class MetaFaceMbrola
extends DigitalSignalProcessor

This class handles the phoneme to viseme mapping for Mbrola:
See the website
It also synthesises speech audio from phoneme information using the Java Native Interface (JNI). The MbrPlay Dynamic Link Library (DLL) is used to achieve this synthesis.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Simon Beard

Native method for synthesising speech audio.

Parameters:
input - The phoneme information

Returns:

initialise

public String initialise(String database,
                         String rename,
                         String clone,
                         float pitchratio,
                         long freq)
Native method for initialising Mbrola.

Parameters:
database - The path to the Mbrola voice database use
rename - The Mbrola phonemes to rename (replace)
clone - The Mbrola phonemes to clone
pitchratio - The pitch ratio to use when synthesising
freq - The frequency of the voice
Returns:
An error message or null
